Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.26053120] Gram-positive bacteria :Bacillus subtilis(MIC=4.0 μM), Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=16 μM), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4.0 μM), ;Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=2.0 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4.0 μM), Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=4.0 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.26053120] MHC=100 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.26053120] IC50 = 10 μM against mouse macrophage-derived RAW264.7 cells.IC50 = 9 μM for NIH3T3 fibroblasts.
Sequence Information.Structure Description: PapMA and PapMA-k exhibited α-helical structures in 50 mM DPC micelles and 50% TFE/H2O but displayed unordered structures in aqueous solution.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Peptoid-Substituted Hybrid Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from Papiliocin and Magainin 2 with Enhanced Bacterial Selectivity and Anti-inflammatory Activity
Literature.Author: Areum Shin, Eunjung Lee,  Dasom Jeon, Young-Guen Park, Jeong Kyu Bang, Yong-Sun Park, Song Yub Shin, and Yangmee Kim
